articles.title: Space exploration could be Earth’s saving grace - Deutsche Welle
articles.description: A bird’s eye view of the Earth could help identify the issues causing the climate crisis, space experts said at the 14th European Space Conference last week.
articles.content:
The first time German astronaut Alexander Gerst took off into space, he was overwhelmed. Hed seen satellite photos of Earth before, but they were nothing in comparison with the real thing.
I [saw] t… [+8032 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Denmark scraps most pandemic restrictions, no longer considers COVID 'a socially critical disease' - ABC News
articles.description: Denmark becomes the first European Union member nation to ditch significant pandemic restrictions, doing away with face masks and digital passes as Omicron drives a surge in daily case numbers.
articles.content: Denmark has become one of the first European Union member nations to scrap most pandemic restrictions as the Scandinavian country no longer considers the COVID-19 outbreak "a socially critical diseas… [+3799 chars]

articles.author: Ben Bocsak
articles.title: Liverpool can follow Fabio Carvalho summer transfer with £31m 'best U20 midfielder in Europe' - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Liverpool are likely to try and arrange a deal with Fabio Carvalho in the summer and once they have wrapped up the Fulham midfielder their next target should be obvious.
articles.content:
In the end, as the clock ticked on, Liverpool just didn't quite have enough time to complete a deal for Fabio Carvalho.
The Fulham attacker will now remain at Craven Cottage for the remainder of the… [+2801 chars]

articles.author: Cosmin Vasile
articles.title: TCL 305 is the latest Android Go phone coming to Europe - PhoneArena
articles.description: TCL's new affordable smartphone, the 305 will be available in both Space Gray and Atlantic Blue and costs just €205 ($228), a good price for European customers.
articles.content: TCL isnt a smartphone company known for its high-end devices, but when it comes to affordability, few other handset manufacturers can compete with its prices in Europe and North America. However, ins… [+1344 chars]
